entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
